comment.author: 21073818@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called "I Love Oklahoma", and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 22515708@N04
comment._content: Somebody correct me if I'm wrong, but I think the Tulsa Mid-Continent refinery is now the Sun Oil refinery.  My graddad (I'll call him my dad since he and my grandmother Margaret raised my sister and me), Rusty Morton worked there for many years, retiring in 1982.  As a matter of fact, I'm packing up to move from my home in Blaine, WA on Puget Sound, and my granddad's Sunray DX hard hat is in there on the kitchen counter.
